title: Title
landing_hero_subtitle: Easier, faster, and all from one place. The sales platform that doesn't feel like a second job.
landing_value_title: No more backtracking, double-selling, or triple-listing.
landing_value_subtitle: Welcome to the platform that syncs with your favorite marketplaces, both online and in‑store. Focus on growing your business, not managing logins.
landing_how_it_works_title: Three simple steps to start selling
landing_step_1_description: Link your existing marketplace accounts with one click. No complex setup required.
landing_step_2_description: Create one listing and publish it everywhere. Import existing products or start fresh.
landing_step_3_description: Manage orders, track inventory, and respond to customers from one dashboard.
landing_step_01_desc: Link your existing marketplace accounts with one click. No complex setup required.
landing_step_02_desc: Create one listing and publish it everywhere. Import existing products or start fresh.
landing_step_03_desc: Manage orders, track inventory, and respond to customers from one dashboard.
landing_testimonial_1_quote: Catalyst cut my listing time in half. I can now manage 5 marketplaces from one place!
landing_testimonial_2_quote: The unified inbox is a game-changer. No more missing customer messages.
landing_testimonial_3_quote: Finally, inventory that actually syncs! No more overselling or disappointed customers.
landing_feature_listings_desc: Create one listing that works on all your favorite sites. Import SKUs or build custom listings effortlessly.
landing_feature_marketplaces_desc: Facebook Marketplace, eBay, Shopify, Etsy and more. Connect with one click and let Catalyst do the rest.
landing_feature_inbox_desc: Sync all your messages from all marketplaces to one location. Respond to email, SMS, or DM from one place.
landing_feature_inventory_desc: View, track, and manage your active listings across all marketplaces from your Catalyst dashboard.
landing_pricing_title: Choose the right plan for you
landing_pricing_subtitle: Simple pricing, no hidden fees. Upgrade or downgrade at any time.
landing_pricing_free_description: Perfect for trying out with no commitment.
landing_pricing_basic_description: Great for small businesses ready to grow.
landing_pricing_pro_description: For power sellers who need unlimited everything.
landing_contact_subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.
landing_contact_sales_description: Need help picking a plan? Our team can help you find the best solution for your business.
landing_cta_title: If you want to sell better, choose Catalyst.

dialog_footer_refund_policy: Please Raise support ticket for Refund policy.
